refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: This file lists the interfaces that are subject to simple traffic shaping. Simple traffic shaping is enabled by setting TC_ENABLED=Simple in shorewall.conf(5).
The columns in the file are as follows.

listitem.para: The logical name of an interface.
Optional. If given specifies whether the interface is external (facing toward the Internet) or internal (interfaces to a local network) and enables SFQ flow classification.
